tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Type 1 Diabetes Treatment,Thyroid Swelling,Diabetes Treatment,High cholesterol,Sugar Level,
review:
I am profoundly grateful to Allah for guiding me to meet Dr. Sahil Fulara. His expertise in the field of medicine is exceptional, and he possesses comprehensive knowledge to effectively treat patients according to their specific ailments. Dr. Fulara patiently listens to patients' concerns and meticulously tailors treatment plans accordingly. His approach extends beyond mere prescription of medications; he conducts thorough root cause analysis. Moreover, he skillfully lightens the atmosphere around patients, alleviating their stress and discomfort with humor.

Under Dr. Sahil Fulara's care, my mother, who was suffering from problems like obesity, thyroid disorders, and diabetes, has made a remarkable progress. Just six months ago, her weight was around 90 kg, and today, it stands at approximately 66 kg—an impressive testament to her significant improvement. Additionally, her diabetes and thyroid levels have shown consistent decline over the months, signaling a substantial relief. If you are experiencing hormonal disorders, obesity, diabetes, or similar issues, I wholeheartedly recommend visiting Dr. Sahil. I am confident you will definitely benefit from his expertise.
reply_text: Very kind of you sir for your kind words. Ur encouraging words n love of ptnt r things which make is going strong. Must say that ur support to ur mother in this treatment has been exceptional. Also ur mother has had great disciplined lifestyle of sleeping early, eating mindfully and exercising which I wish n hope every1 should follow her footsteps

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My father (80yrs) has been under treatment of Dr.Sahil Fulara for his multiple health issues. 
Dr. listened to him very patiently and studied all his reports in great detail. After which he prescribed the necessary treatment and took the time to explain everything in detail. His diagnosis and treatment has tremendously improved my father’s health.
Usually conversations with a doc is one sided where the patient listens and follows instructions (sometimes without understanding) but NOT with Dr.Sahil. His patience, warm and jovial nature along with a positive attitude made it very easy to interact with him.
Even though we have a doctor/patient relationship with him, it’s become a very close one and his periodic follow ups show that he has utmost regard and care for his patients.
Very rarely do you come across someone like Dr.Sahil and I highly recommend him to everyone.

review: Dr Sahil has been a great help to us. We have been dealing with many doctors but have never seen someone so caring. He connects with his patients at personal level as well and ensures that he is updated on the progress. He has treated my mom who was infected with covid. She is 75 years old and has hypertension. He started the treatment right on day one. The medicines and the treatment course that he prescribes takes care of the issues very soon. He often speaks to my mom during video consultations and makes her laugh this melts our hearts.  I have consulted top most doctors in Mumbai and Bangalore and can proudly say that he is the best of all.  We are so fortunate that we found him. God bless!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have visited Dr.Sahil Fulara for both my parents and suggest his name to every one suffering from diabetes or hormonal problems. 
Apart from his commendable medical expertise and professionalism; he is a great human being who is genuinely concerned with his patient's well being.
Some of his major attributes which most medical fraternity is lacking nowadays;
He is very compassionate and understanding about his patient's condition
He pays individual attention and time for patient's queries and concerns and is extremely kind especially dealing with elderly patients
He keeps in touch through calls and WhatsApp and is extremely prompt in his replies in case of emergency situations (he has taken calls at odd hours multiple times for both my parents)
He has gone out of his way and helped us in finding an ICU bed when it was very difficult to get one.
We wish to thank him for his kind help and may Almighty bless him always.
Continue doing the great work sir!!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
After i detected very high sugar levels, its natural to panic due to multiple complication it can lead to in future. In order to avoid medication, i self controlled my diet and sugar intake for couple of months. However, i realized that just diet is not the solution, hence consulted Dr Sahil Fulara. Due to lockdown, i opted for video consultancy. Dr Sahil first reviewed all my reports and explained me in details what all issues i was facing which was not restricted to Diabetes. He spent enough time without any hurry and answered all my queries unless i was satisfied. He helped me settle my panic state. 

And mere 10 days into treatment, my readings are just above normal and im expecting it to be in complete control within a week.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: In this beautiful world we have such a wonderful ,humble, down to earth,kind concern and the most important thing is the listening part of the Very Respected Doctor Sahil Fulara . I was properly diagnosed right upto the root of cause of my ailment . I was explained all the effects and side effects of Meds I take. Step by step I was made understand my line of treatment . we feel nice having good rapport developed with Dr Sahil ,had a  friendly discussion not a consultation hahah. highly commendable and highly appreciated .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Sahil Fulara is a very *********** *** caring doctor who listens to his patients, and plans the treatment accordingly based on every individuals needs. I was referred to Dr. Fulara because of my hypothyroidism and high blood glucose levels. His treatment has helped me a lot in maintaining proper thyroid levels, blood glucose levels, and the best part is I have also lost weight based on the nutrition/ diet charts that were provided to me and his excellent guidance. I am in the United States now and because of lockdown was not able to make it in time to my India visit and get me medications. He was super supportive and contacted me if I needed the meds couriered. I would highly recommend anyone who is suffering from endocrinological issues etc. to consult with Dr. Fulara.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Type 1 Diabetes Treatment,Diabetes Management,Diabetes,Type 2 Diabetes Treatment,
review:
Well what should i say about this doctor. He has been like an angel to me. Thankfull to practo that i could find him. In worst  of times i.e pandemic of corona my father was diagnosed with very high sugar i.e 570 to be exact with kidney and liver reports also abnormal. My FIL salt was also low as per reports. As per doctor he was in  diabetic keto acidosis. Due to corona fear we treated at him with saline and insulin. After a week all his reports are normal and sugar has come down to 180. The best part about doctor is very encouraging and just a call away.
I would therefore highlyyy recommend this doctor to every1 ..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Thyroid disorder - Hypothyroidism and Hyperthyroidism  , Thyroid swelling/goiter,
review: This doctor really cares for his patients.  He was so concerned about my thyroid check up, as I was extremely busy and kept postponing.  So in November 2019, he arranged a conference call and got me to get an appointment, I told him I am traveling on that particular day when he was having consultations, he insisted and said what time is your flight and arranged a consultation even before his normal timing, and keepin my flight timing in mind. I was so taken a back by this concern, that I made it with all my test and reports etc, only to find out that I really needed to start the treatment, and had I to just postpone it again, I would have made a lot of damage to my thyroid gland, heart and body... Amazing Doctor, I pray and certainly it was Gods will to have a doctor so concerned to come to Goa, all the way from mumbai and take care of his patients.
